string.text: Find a way to the Chernobyl NPP
The way to the Chernobyl NPP leads through the ruined hospital. Hurry - Strelok made it through the Scorcher and he’s very close to the power plant. Find the entrance to the catacombs.
Take out the helicopter
Shoot down the military helicopter.
Kill the sniper
The sniper isn’t protected from this side. Kill the sniper.
Sneak up on the sniper
The hospital hall is covered by a sniper and a machine gun nest. The sniper’s position is well-protected. Clear Sky will distract the enemy while you cross the hall to take the sniper out.
Get to the other side of the hall

The machine gunner is unleashing hell on the lower floor while the sniper has the upper floor covered. Clear Sky will distract the enemy for a short while. Move only when given the order by the commander of the Clear Sky squad.
Reach the bridge
You need to reach the bridge. Move only when given the order by the commander of the Clear Sky squad - Clear Sky will distract the enemy.
Cross the bridge
Cross the bridge. Move only when given the order by the commander of the Clear Sky squad - Clear Sky will distract the enemy.
Move into the next hall
The falling helicopter blew up the wall and opened the path into the next hall. Proceed to the next hall.
Cover the Clear Sky squad
The Clear Sky squad is advancing to blow up the machine gun nest. Monolithians are attacking the squad. Provide covering fire for the Clear Sky squad.
Hold out until help arrives
A Clear Sky squad is approaching. Hold out until reinforcements arrive.
